recipe.name: spaghetti
recipe.cooking_steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a pan, cook diced bacon and minced garlic until bacon is crispy. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated parmesan cheese. Drain pasta and add to pan with bacon and garlic. Toss to combine. Pour egg and cheese mixture over pasta and stir until evenly distributed and sauce has thickened.

recipe.name: chicken
recipe.cooking_steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Rinse chicken and pat dry with paper towels. Season chicken inside and out with salt and pepper. Place chicken in a roasting pan and brush with olive oil. Roast for 1 hour 30 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C). Squeeze lemon juice over chicken before serving.

recipe.name: pizza
recipe.ingredients: 1 ball of pizza dough,3/4 cup of crushed tomatoes,1/2 tsp of dried oregano,1/2 tsp of salt,1/2 tsp of sugar,1 cup of fresh mozzarella cheese
recipe.cooking_steps: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C). In a bowl, mix together the crushed tomatoes, oregano, salt, sugar, and garlic. Roll out the pizza dough and spread the tomato mixture on top, leaving a 1-inch border around the edge. Add the mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and parmesan cheese on top of the tomato mixture. Bake the pizza in the oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

recipe.name: sushi
recipe.ingredients: 2 cups of sushi rice,4 sheets of nori (dried seaweed),1 avocado,1/2 lb of crab meat or imitation crab meat,1/2 small cucumber
recipe.cooking_steps: Prepare the sushi rice by cooking it in a pot with 2 1/2 cups of water according to package instructions. Then let it cool to room temperature. In a small saucepan, heat the rice vinegar, sugar, and salt over medium heat until the sugar dissolves. Stir in the cooled sushi rice. Place one sheet of nori, shiny-side down, on a bamboo sushi rolling mat. Spread about 1/2 cup of the sushi rice evenly over the nori, leaving a 1-inch border on the top edge. Turn the nori and rice over so that the rice is facing down and the nori is facing up. Arrange the avocado, crab meat or imitation crab meat, and cucumber in a line across the center of the nori. Spread the mayonnaise over the ingredients. Lift the edge of the rolling mat closest to you and roll it away from you, pressing gently to shape the roll. Repeat the process with the remaining ingredients to make more rolls. Slice the rolls into pieces and serve with soy sauce and wasabi on the side.

recipe.name: cookies
recipe.ingredients: flour ,1tsp of baking soda,1 cup of unsalted butter ,white sugar,brown sugar,2 large eggs,vanilla extract,chocolate chips
recipe.cooking_steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract. Gradually mix in the flour mixture until just combined. Fold in the chocolate chips. Drop rounded spoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden. Remove from the oven and let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipe.name: mashedpotatoes
recipe.ingredients: 2 lbs of potatoes,unsalted butter, whole milk,1 tsp of salt,black pepper
recipe.cooking_steps: Place the chopped potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil and cook until the potatoes are tender, about 15-20 minutes. Drain the potatoes and return them to the saucepan. Add the butter, milk, salt, and pepper. Mash the potatoes with a potato masher or fork until smooth. Taste and adjust the seasoning as desired. Serve hot with your favorite main dish.

recipe.name: salmon
recipe.ingredients: 4 salmon fillets,2 tbsp of olive oil,salt, black pepper,1 lemon
recipe.cooking_steps: Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil to the skillet and swirl to coat the bottom of the pan. Place the salmon fillets in the skillet, skin-side down, and cook for 4-5 minutes, or until the skin is crispy and golden brown. Flip the salmon fillets over and cook for another 3-4 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork. Remove the salmon from the skillet and place on a serving platter. Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the top, to taste. Serve hot with your favorite sides.

recipe.name: cake
recipe.ingredients: all-purpose flour,baking powder,unsalted butter,granulated sugar,eggs,vanilla extract,whole milk
recipe.cooking_steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter mixture, alternating with the milk. Divide the batter evenly between the prepared cake pans and smooth the tops.Bake for 35-40 minutes,

recipe.name: milkshake

ingredients.ingredient: whole milk,vanilla ice cream,chocolate syrup,whipped cream (optional)

recipe.cooking_steps: Combine the milk, vanilla ice cream, and chocolate syrup in a blender. Blend until smooth, about 1-2 minutes. Pour the milkshake into a tall glass. Top with whipped cream and chocolate chips or sprinkles, if desired.

recipe.name: salad
recipe.ingredients: romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes,sliced red onion, sliced cucumber
recipe.cooking_steps: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cucumber make the dressing. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Serve the salad immediately, or store in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
